alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Knox; Marion; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 11:33AM EDT until April 01 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Richland County in north central Ohio... Marion County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Ashland County in north central Ohio... Morrow County in north central Ohio... Southern Crawford County in north central Ohio... Knox County in north central Ohio... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1132 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bucyrus to near Richwood, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Marion, Mount Vernon, Mount Gilead, Galion, Lexington, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Gambier, Utica, Cardington, Bellville, Centerburg, Ashley, Prospect, Danville, Waldo, Chesterville, Sparta and Waterford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Crawford; Knox; Marion; Morrow; Richland
